content.raw:
This question is slightly outside the scope of this PR. 

Are we planning to wrap all cmake configs, rather than directly using a project's installed version? I see the nice features `ign_find_package` brings to the table, but there is also more maintenance on our side.  Is there some other benefit or reason that I'm missing?
content.html:

Are we planning to wrap all cmake configs, rather than directly using a project's installed version? I see the nice features ign_find_package brings to the table, but there is also more maintenance on our side. Is there some other benefit or reason that I'm missing?
